item.description:
Here's the deal - overwriting all the updates so people aren't confused. We'll meet at Sidebar at 8pm. I have a deal set up for $20 per person that'll include some apps, and one drink token per person. Please bring cash because we won't be able to do separate checks for cards for that portion. They'll set us up in the lounge, and then around 10:30, we have to give that space up. So we can stay at Sidebar or we can travel to different bars. We'll get a group consensus then.

 

If you can't join for the food/drink/cover deal, please let me know. I need to give them an estimate of how many people and I don't want to be stuck with a large bill at the end because no one wanted to join for that part. No big deal, I just need to know in advance.

 

If you have any questions or need to get a hold of me - call/text 716-307-6590

 

-Jocelyn
item.name: West Hartford Barhopping (starting at Elbow Room/Sidebar)
